## Goal
Describe the objective of this PR in 1-2 sentences.

## Changes
- What changes were made?
- Which files were added/modified?
- Briefly explain why these changes are necessary

## Testing
How was this work tested/verified?

## Artifacts & Screenshots
Attach screenshots, API outputs, or other evidence demonstrating completion.

## Pre-submission Checklist
- [ ] PR title is clear and descriptive
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] No secrets, credentials, or large temp files committed
